content:
### **🔥 Strategic AI Outreach – Finding the Right Balance**  

✅ **Your concern is valid.** Sam Altman and Andrew Ng are likely **too high-level** to engage.  
✅ We need **a balance** between **high-impact** and **likelihood to engage.**  
✅ **The goal:** Target **AI leaders who are active & responsive**, not just big names.  

---

### **🔹 Adjusted AI Influencer Target List (More Likely to Engage)**  

#### **🚀 Tier 1 (More Likely to Engage, Still High Impact)**
These are **AI experts, investors, and startup leaders** who actively engage in discussions on LinkedIn & Twitter.  

1️⃣ **Steve Nouri** (AI Thought Leader, OpenAI Ambassador)  
   - 📌 **Why?** Engages heavily on LinkedIn, frequently comments on AI posts.  
   - **LinkedIn:** [Steve Nouri](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stevenouri/)  
   - **Twitter:** [@SteveNouri](https://twitter.com/SteveNouri)  

2️⃣ **Allie K. Miller** (AI Investor & Advisor, Ex-Amazon AI)  
   - 📌 **Why?** Actively supports AI career transitions & AI adoption in business.  
   - **LinkedIn:** [Allie K. Miller](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alliekmiller/)  
   - **Twitter:** [@alliekmiller](https://twitter.com/alliekmiller)  

3️⃣ **Matt Shumer** (CEO of HyperWrite AI, AI Startup Founder)  
   - 📌 **Why?** Openly engages with AI discussions, runs an AI-powered job automation tool.  
   - **LinkedIn:** [Matt Shumer](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mattshumer/)  
   - **Twitter:** [@mattshumer_](https://twitter.com/mattshumer_)  

4️⃣ **Santiago Valdarrama** (AI Engineer, Educator, & Content Creator)  
   - 📌 **Why?** Shares AI job market insights, engages with AI hiring trends.  
   - **LinkedIn:** [Santiago Valdarrama](https://www.linkedin.com/in/svpino/)  
   - **Twitter:** [@svpino](https://twitter.com/svpino)  

5️⃣ **Louis Bouchard** (AI Communicator, Runs "What's AI?")  
   - 📌 **Why?** Focuses on AI use cases & applications, frequently interacts with AI discussions.  
   - **LinkedIn:** [Louis Bouchard](https://www.linkedin.com/in/louis-bouchard-ai/)  
   - **Twitter:** [@Whats_AI](https://twitter.com/Whats_AI)  

---

#### **🔥 Tier 2 (More Experimental – Worth Testing Engagement)**
- **Aidan Gomez** (CEO of Cohere) – **Likely too busy, but possible.**  
- **Logan Kilpatrick** (OpenAI Developer Relations) – **Higher chance of engagement.**  
- **Grady Booch** (IBM Research Fellow, AI Ethics Speaker) – **Engages sometimes.**  

---

### **🔹 Next Steps – Execution Plan**  
📌 **1️⃣ Send Connection Requests on LinkedIn (with tailored messages).**  
📌 **2️⃣ Engage with their latest LinkedIn/Twitter posts before DMing.**  
📌 **3️⃣ DM them a short message (direct but thoughtful).**  

---

### **🔹 Suggested DM Template**  
💡 **Make this highly personal & tailored. Adjust per person.**  

**Subject:** AI-Driven Hiring Shift – Would Love Your Take  

Hey [Name],  

I’m running a live AI experiment on how AI **is already eliminating white-collar roles faster than hiring models can adapt.**  

I’d love your take on how we should be thinking about **AI-driven hiring & career evolution.**  

Just posted an AI breakdown on this—would love your thoughts if you have a minute: [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  

Either way, big fan of your work. Looking forward to your insights!  

Best,  
Jesse  

---

🔥 **Final Call – Are You Good with This List & Plan?**  
If yes, we’ll **execute the AI outreach now**, then move to MVP. 🚀
